title: jeremypwr
author: jeremypwr
content: UFC Fight Night 227 Multi Master Challenge   Prizes1st place: 3 mBTC Free Bet2nd place: 2 mBTC Free Bet3rd place: 1 mBTC Free BetThe Rules are similar to the original Sportsbet.io Multi Master that we all enjoyed so muchRulesa)  Predict the winner of each match (earn 1-2 points)b)  Predict how many matches will NOT go the Full Distance (will be adjusted accordingly if matches get cancelled)Odds @ https://sportsbet.io/sports/mma/ufc/ufc-fight-night-grasso-vs-shevchenko-2/matchesMatches(2 points each)11. Alexa Grasso vs. Valentina Shevchenko (must get 11 correct to proceed)10. Kevin Holland vs. Jack Della Maddalena9. Raul Rosas Jr vs. Terrence Mitchell8. Daniel Zellhuber vs. Christos Giagos7. Fernando Padilla vs. Kyle Nelson(1 point each)6. Lupita Godinez vs. Elise Reed5. Roman Kopylov vs. Josh Fremd4. Edgar Chairez vs. Daniel Lacerda3. Tracy Cortez vs. Jasmine Jasudavicius2. Josefine Lindgren Knutsson vs. Marnic Mann1. Alex Reyes vs. Charlie CampbellNOT go the Full Distance   Make sure your Prediction is in this format    Example11. Alexa Grasso 10. Kevin Holland 9. Raul Rosas Jr 8. Daniel Zellhuber 7. Fernando Padilla 6. Lupita Godinez 5. Roman Kopylov 4. Edgar Chairez 3. Tracy Cortez 2. Josefine Lindgren Knutsson1. Alex Reyes NOT go the Full Distance 6

comments.author: jeremypwr
comments.body: Sportsbet.io has been kind enough to sponsor my Prediction Contests and Promos for a while now.Sportsbet.io is a sports betting website; therefore these Prediction Contests and Promos are catered to those who actually bet on/discuss sports.If you are unsure if you qualify, just shoot me a PM.  Thank you for your cooperation.
